text: Miconia caelata is a species of plant in the family Melastomataceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist montane forests and subtropical or tropical high-altitude shrubland.Cotton, E. & Pitman, N. 2004. Miconia caelata. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
